text: namnyeo sin-ang-indeul-eun seologa seo loleul wihan bohojala geudeul-eun seon-eul haenghago saagham-eul meollihamyeo yebaeleuldeuligo iseullamseleul bachila hasyeossnola ttohan hananimgwa geubun-ui seonjija ege sunjonghasa hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege eunhyeleul bepul geos-ila sillo hananim-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
